title: The Sunday Read: ‘Why We Take Animal Voyages’
description: What I’ve learned from a lifetime of voyaging with animals.
dc:creator: Sam Anderson, Adrienne Hurst, Aaron Esposito, John Woo and Sophia Lanman
media:credit: Matthew Pillsbury for The New York Times
media:description: Yuki, whose name means “snow” in Japanese, at the Philadelphia Zoo.
